alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Waupaca, northwestern Outagamie and central Shawano Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 527 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Clintonville, or 15 miles northeast of Waupaca, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clintonville around 545 PM CDT. Embarrass around 555 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Fitzgerald Corners, Buckbee, Northport, Sugar Bush, Caroline, Adams Beach, Lunds, Deer Creek Wildlife Area, Royalton and Bear Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
